Plot: When her mother disappears, Clary Fray learns that she descends from a line of warriors who protect our world from demons. She joins forces with others like her and heads into a dangerous alternate New York called the Shadow World.
Title: The Mortal Instruments: City of Bones
Writer: Jessica Postigo (screenplay), Cassandra Clare (based on the novel by)
Actors: Lily Collins, Jamie Campbell Bower, Kevin Zegers, Jemima West
tomatoConsensus: The Mortal Instruments: City of Bones borrows ingredients from seemingly every fantasy franchise of the last 30 years -- but can't seem to figure out what to do with them.
